page.title: 03 Education
page.content: St Werburghs School was built in 1848 and cost 900 pounds. The school has been standing for 137 years.In 1985 it is being closed.It is a Primary school. There are 32 children in the school with two teachers. The school has two playgrounds,an Infant playground and a Junior playground. We have outside toilets and behind the toilets there is a chequer board garden. The chequer board garden is very nice. There are 18 families in the school. Of the 32 children, that go to school in Hanbury only half of them were born here. The headteacher is Mr.S.Wynn and the infants are taught by Mrs.M.Wynn. The Governors are Rev.F.Powell, Mrs.D.H.H.Brown,Mrs.J.Ireland, Mrs.A.Hallam,Mr.I.Montgomery, Mr.R.Marler.
